name: Akira Technologies
description:
Akira Technologies, Inc., is an information technology company delivering sophisticated, customized solutions that improve business efficiency across the enterprise. Akira is an agile provider of technical solutions that enable mission-critical operations and decision-making. Our solutions help our customers improve their business performance through information technology transformation services focusing on architecture, information management, systems integration, and integrated solutions.
We founded Akira on a single promise to our clients: to do whatever it takes to deliver the right business results, on time and on budget. Since 2003, we have consistently delivered on this promise, achieving success for our clients.
